en_us: Create special hoppers that teleport nearby items to them.
Ender Hoppers teleport items to itself, even through walls.\n\nThey can also be combined with a minecart to create an Ender Hopper Minecart.
Ender Hoppers can be crafted in a Custom Crafter:

Ender Hoppers can pick up items in a range of 9x9 blocks, centered at itself and extending 3 blocks above itself.\n\nCombining a minecart with an ender hopper in a custom crafter yields an ender hopper minecart.
